column4: hello is there a lightweight version of ubuntu ? my laptop seems to run it very slow
basically this laptop is getting old
there is diff linuxs like crunchbang dsl etc
I run a minimal ubuntu with xfce on a 2001 pent3 lappy
so how dumbed down are the mini.iso
it is a cli environment that you can add X and apps you want - so it can be very light or heavy - your choice
drivers come with the kernel and i just use a static ip address in the interface file and all is good
i've been looking for something like this for a long time
i hate gui, i just want a dark screen, with a cursor
50mb mem used just after booting on the lappy
